name: London T. Phillips
description:
WARNING: THIS VIDEO CONTAINS GRAPHIC CONTENT

The Washington County Sheriff's Office has released security footage of the shooting of Fayetteville Police Officer Stephen Carr, who was "ambushed and executed" by 35-year-old London Phillips. Phillips was shot and killed by police.

Video credit: Washington County Sheriff's Office
